data.title: Free clean fill dirt
data.description: I have maybe 1.5 to 2 yards of clean fill dirt for anybody who wants to take it. It's in my backyard so I will want to make arrangements with you to come pick up. If you time it right I will even help you shovel it into your truck!

data.title: Free Dirt
data.description: We have a giant pile of fill dirt dug out from our yard. Free for anyone who has tools to take away. Please take it away! Address is 6303 NE 6th Ave, but it's in the driveway along Holman. Will delete posting when it's all gone.

data.title: STILL HAVE A LOT OF FREE CLEAN FILL DIRT
data.description:
We keep on digging so have much more. 
Free clean fill dirt. A lot of it - see picture. 
Please do not ask if i can deliver. We only supply the free dirt. Make an appointment and get it. I may be able to help load at your own risk and liability.
